verses.verse: And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD: <WH3068> and the LORD <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of Midian <WH4080> seven <WH7651> years. <WH8141>

And the hand <WH3027> of Midian <WH4080> prevailed <WH5810> against <WH5921> Israel: <WH3478> and because <WH6440> of the Midianites <WH4080> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> made <WH6213> them the dens <WH4492> which <WH834> are in the mountains, <WH2022> and caves, <WH4631> and strong <WH4679> holds. <WH4679>

And so it was, when <WH518> Israel <WH3478> had sown, <WH2232> that the Midianites <WH4080> came <WH5927> up, and the Amalekites, <WH6003> and the children <WH1121> of the east, <WH6924> even they came <WH5927> up against <WH5921> them;

And they encamped <WH2583> against <WH5921> them, and destroyed <WH7843> the increase <WH2981> of the earth, <WH776> till <WH5704> you come <WH935> to Gaza, <WH5804> and left <WH7604> no <WH3808> sustenance <WH4241> for Israel, <WH3478> neither sheep, <WH7716> nor ox, <WH7794> nor ass. <WH2543>

For they came <WH5927> up with their cattle <WH4735> and their tents, <WH168> and they came <WH935> as grasshoppers <WH697> for multitude; <WH7230> for both they and their camels <WH1581> were without <WH369> number: <WH4557> and they entered <WH935> into the land <WH776> to destroy <WH7843> it.
And Israel <WH3478> was greatly <WH3966> impoverished <WH1809> because <WH6440> of the Midianites; <WH4080> and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> cried <WH2199> to the LORD. <WH3068>
And it came <WH1961> to pass, when <WH3588> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> cried <WH2199> to the LORD <WH3068> because <WH5921> <WH182> of the Midianites, <WH4080>

That the LORD <WH3068> sent <WH7971> a prophet <WH5030> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> which said <WH559> to them, Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> I brought <WH5927> you up from Egypt, <WH4714> and brought <WH3318> you forth <WH3318> out of the house <WH1004> of bondage; <WH5650>

And I delivered <WH5337> you out of the hand <WH3027> of the Egyptians, <WH4714> and out of the hand <WH3027> of all <WH3605> that oppressed <WH3905> you, and drove <WH1644> them out from before <WH6440> you, and gave <WH5414> you their land; <WH776>

And I said <WH559> to you, I am the LORD <WH3068> your God; <WH430> fear <WH3372> not the gods <WH430> of the Amorites, <WH567> in whose <WH834> land <WH776> you dwell: <WH3427> but you have not obeyed <WH8085> my voice. <WH6963>

And there came <WH935> an angel <WH4397> of the LORD, <WH3068> and sat <WH3427> under <WH8478> an oak <WH424> which <WH834> was in Ophrah, <WH6084> that pertained to Joash <WH3101> the Abiezrite: <WH33> and his son <WH1121> Gideon <WH1439> threshed <WH2251> wheat <WH2406> by the wine press, <WH1660> to hide <WH5127> it from the Midianites. <WH4080>
And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> to him, and said <WH559> to him, The LORD <WH3068> is with you, you mighty <WH1368> man of valor. <WH2428>

And Gideon <WH1439> said <WH559> to him, Oh <WH994> my Lord, <WH113> if the LORD <WH3068> be with us, why <WH4100> then is all <WH3605> this <WH2063> befallen <WH4672> us? and where <WH346> be all <WH3605> his miracles <WH6381> which <WH834> our fathers <WH1> told <WH5608> us of, saying, <WH559> Did not the LORD <WH3068> bring <WH5927> us up from Egypt? <WH4714> but now <WH6258> the LORD <WH3068> has forsaken <WH5203> us, and delivered <WH5414> us into the hands <WH3709> of the Midianites. <WH4080>

And the LORD <WH3068> looked <WH6437> on him, and said, <WH559> Go <WH3212> in this <WH2088> your might, <WH3581> and you shall save <WH3467> Israel <WH3478> from the hand <WH3709> of the Midianites: <WH4080> have not I sent <WH7971> you?

And he said <WH559> to him, Oh <WH994> my Lord, <WH136> with which <WH4100> shall I save <WH3467> Israel? <WH3478> behold, <WH2009> my family <WH504> is poor <WH1800> in Manasseh, <WH4519> and I am the least <WH6810> in my father's <WH1> house. <WH1004>
And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to him, Surely <WH3588> I will be with you, and you shall smite <WH5221> the Midianites <WH4080> as one <WH259> man. <WH376>
And he said <WH559> to him, If <WH518> now <WH4994> I have found <WH4672> grace <WH2580> in your sight, <WH5869> then show <WH6213> me a sign <WH226> that you talk <WH1696> with me.

Depart <WH4185> not hence, <WH2088> I pray <WH4994> you, until <WH5704> I come <WH935> to you, and bring <WH3318> forth <WH3318> my present, <WH4503> and set <WH3240> it before <WH6440> you. And he said, <WH559> I will tarry <WH3427> until <WH5704> you come <WH7725> again. <WH7725>

And Gideon <WH1439> went <WH935> in, and made <WH6213> ready a kid, <WH1423> <WH5795> and unleavened <WH4682> cakes <WH4682> of an ephah <WH374> of flour: <WH7058> the flesh <WH1320> he put <WH7760> in a basket, <WH5536> and he put <WH7760> the broth <WH4839> in a pot, <WH6517> and brought <WH3318> it out to him under <WH8478> the oak, <WH424> and presented <WH5066> it.

And the angel <WH4397> of God <WH430> said <WH559> to him, Take <WH3947> the flesh <WH1320> and the unleavened <WH4682> cakes, <WH4682> and lay <WH3240> them on this <WH1975> rock, <WH5553> and pour <WH8210> out the broth. <WH4839> And he did <WH6213> so. <WH3651>

Then the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> put <WH7971> forth <WH7971> the end <WH7097> of the staff <WH4938> that was in his hand, <WH3027> and touched <WH5060> the flesh <WH1320> and the unleavened <WH4682> cakes; <WH4682> and there rose <WH5927> up fire <WH784> out of the rock, <WH6697> and consumed <WH398> the flesh <WH1320> and the unleavened <WH4682> cakes. <WH4682> Then the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> departed <WH1980> out of his sight. <WH5869>

And when Gideon <WH1439> perceived <WH7200> that he was an angel <WH4397> of the LORD, <WH136> Gideon <WH1439> said, <WH559> Alas, <WH162> O LORD <WH3068> God! <WH3069> for because <WH5921> <WH3651> I have seen <WH7200> an angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> face <WH6440> to face. <WH6440>
And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to him, Peace <WH7965> be to you; fear <WH3372> not: you shall not die. <WH4191>

Then Gideon <WH1439> built <WH1129> an altar <WH4196> there <WH8033> to the LORD, <WH3068> and called <WH7121> it Jehovahshalom: <WH3073> to this <WH2088> day <WH3117> it is yet <WH5750> in Ophrah <WH6084> of the Abiezrites. <WH33>

And it came <WH1961> to pass the same <WH1931> night, <WH3915> that the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to him, Take <WH3947> your father's <WH1> young <WH6499> bullock, <WH6499> even the second <WH8145> bullock <WH6499> of seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> old, and throw <WH2040> down <WH2040> the altar <WH4196> of Baal <WH1168> that your father <WH1> has, and cut <WH3772> down the grove <WH842> that is by it:

And build <WH1129> an altar <WH4196> to the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> on the top <WH7218> of this <WH2088> rock, <WH4581> in the ordered <WH4634> place, <WH4634> and take <WH3947> the second <WH8145> bullock, <WH6499> and offer <WH5927> a burnt <WH5930> sacrifice with the wood <WH6086> of the grove <WH842> which <WH834> you shall cut <WH3772> down.

Then Gideon <WH1439> took <WH3947> ten <WH6235> men <WH582> of his servants, <WH5650> and did <WH6213> as the LORD <WH3068> had said <WH1696> to him: and so it was, because <WH834> he feared <WH3372> his father's <WH1> household, <WH1004> and the men <WH582> of the city, <WH5892> that he could not do <WH6213> it by day, <WH3119> that he did <WH6213> it by night. <WH3915>

And when the men <WH582> of the city <WH5892> arose <WH7925> early <WH7925> in the morning, <WH1242> behold, <WH2009> the altar <WH4196> of Baal <WH1168> was cast <WH5422> down, <WH5422> and the grove <WH842> was cut <WH3772> down that was by it, and the second <WH8145> bullock <WH6499> was offered <WH5927> on the altar <WH4196> that was built. <WH1129>

And they said <WH559> one <WH376> to another, <WH7453> Who <WH4310> has done <WH6213> this <WH2088> thing? <WH1697> And when they inquired <WH1875> and asked, <WH1245> they said, <WH559> Gideon <WH1439> the son <WH1121> of Joash <WH3101> has done <WH6213> this <WH2088> thing. <WH1697>

Then the men <WH582> of the city <WH5892> said <WH559> to Joash, <WH3101> Bring <WH3318> out your son, <WH1121> that he may die: <WH4191> because <WH3588> he has cast <WH5422> down the altar <WH4196> of Baal, <WH1168> and because <WH3588> he has cut <WH3772> down the grove <WH842> that was by it.

And Joash <WH3101> said <WH559> to all <WH3605> that stood <WH5975> against <WH5921> him, Will you plead <WH7378> for Baal? <WH1168> will you save <WH3467> him? he that will plead <WH7378> for him, let him be put to death <WH4191> whilst <WH5704> it is yet morning: <WH1242> if <WH518> he be a god, <WH430> let him plead <WH7378> for himself, because <WH3588> one has cast <WH5422> down <WH5422> his altar. <WH4196>

Therefore on that day <WH3117> he called <WH7121> him Jerubbaal, <WH3378> saying, <WH559> Let Baal <WH1168> plead <WH7378> against him, because <WH3588> he has thrown <WH5422> down <WH5422> his altar. <WH4196>

Then all <WH3605> the Midianites <WH4080> and the Amalekites <WH6003> and the children <WH1121> of the east <WH6924> were gathered <WH622> together, <WH3162> and went <WH5674> over, <WH5674> and pitched <WH2583> in the valley <WH6010> of Jezreel. <WH3157>
But the Spirit <WH7307> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH3847> on Gideon, <WH1439> and he blew <WH8628> a trumpet; <WH7782> and Abiezer <WH44> was gathered <WH2199> after <WH310> him.

And he sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> throughout all <WH3605> Manasseh; <WH4519> who also <WH1571> was gathered <WH2199> after <WH310> him: and he sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> to Asher, <WH836> and to Zebulun, <WH2074> and to Naphtali; <WH5321> and they came <WH5927> up to meet <WH7125> them.
And Gideon <WH1439> said <WH559> to God, <WH430> If <WH518> you will save <WH3467> Israel <WH3478> by my hand, <WH3027> as you have said, <WH1696>

Behold, <WH2009> I will put <WH3322> a fleece <WH1492> of wool <WH6785> in the floor; <WH1637> and if <WH518> the dew <WH2919> be on <WH5921> the fleece <WH1492> only, <WH905> and it be dry <WH2721> on all <WH3605> the earth <WH776> beside, then shall I know <WH3045> that you will save <WH3467> Israel <WH3478> by my hand, <WH3027> as you have said. <WH1696>

And it was so: <WH3651> for he rose <WH7925> up early <WH7925> on the morrow, <WH4283> and thrust <WH2115> the fleece <WH1492> together, and wringed <WH4680> the dew <WH2919> out of the fleece, <WH1492> a bowl <WH5602> full <WH4392> of water. <WH4325>

And Gideon <WH1439> said <WH559> to God, <WH430> Let not your anger <WH639> be hot <WH2734> against me, and I will speak <WH1696> but this once: <WH6471> let me prove, <WH5254> I pray <WH4994> you, but this once <WH6471> with the fleece; <WH1492> let it now <WH4994> be dry <WH2721> only <WH905> on the fleece, <WH1492> and on all <WH3605> the ground <WH776> let there be dew. <WH2919>
And God <WH430> did <WH6213> so <WH3651> that night: <WH3915> for it was dry <WH2721> on the fleece <WH1492> only, <WH905> and there was dew <WH2919> on <WH5921> all <WH3605> the ground. <WH776>
